name: Gotta Bake 'Em All!
description:
The Embeded HTML version is a Post-Jam version!

You’re the cook!


And the wild is your playground!

Gather ingredients around you in order to make and deliver food!

Some item hints

Quick peek

Controls
  •  Character Movement : WASD/Arrows (Keyboard) - Left stick (Gamepad)
  •  Interact : Left Control(Keyboard) - A (Gamepad)
  • Esc : Pause and hints
Team
